publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-753 Fergus Ewing: A95-That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by the Scottish Executive of the inclusion in the roads improvement programme of a scheme to upgrade and improve the A95 and calls upon the Executive to consult the local community as to exactly what the scheme will involve, and to lodge full details of their proposals with regard to the A95 in the Scottish Parliament Information Centre.
S1M-753 A95 (lodged on 7 April 2000) Brian Adam*

S1M-753 Fergus Ewing: A95—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by the Scottish Executive of the inclusion in the roads improvement programme of a scheme to upgrade and improve the A95 and calls upon the Executive to consult the local community as to exactly what the scheme will involve, and to lodge full details of their proposals with regard to the A95 in the Scottish Parliament Information Centre. Supported by: Brian Adam
S1M-753 A95 (lodged on 7 April 2000) Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-753 A95 (lodged on 7 April 2000) Tricia Marwick*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-753 A95 (lodged on 7 April 2000) Mary Scanlon*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*

S1M-753 Fergus Ewing: A95—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by the Scottish Executive of the inclusion in the roads improvement programme of a scheme to upgrade and improve the A95 and calls upon the Executive to consult the local community as to exactly what the scheme will involve, and to lodge full details of their proposals with regard to the A95 in the Scottish Parliament Information Centre. Supported by: Brian Adam, Mr Adam Ingram, Tricia Marwick, Mr Gil Paterson, Mary Scanlon, Mr Kenny MacAskill
S1M-753 A95 (lodged on 7 April 2000) Alex Neil*

S1M-753 Fergus Ewing: A95—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by the Scottish Executive of the inclusion in the roads improvement programme of a scheme to upgrade and improve the A95 and calls upon the Executive to consult the local community as to exactly what the scheme will involve, and to lodge full details of their proposals with regard to the A95 in the Scottish Parliament Information Centre. Supported by: Brian Adam, Mr Adam Ingram, Tricia Marwick, Mr Gil Paterson, Mary Scanlon, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Alex Neil
S1M-753 A95 (lodged on 7 April 2000) Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-753 A95 (lodged on 7 April 2000) Mr Duncan Hamilton*

S1M-753 Fergus Ewing: A95-That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by the Scottish Executive of the inclusion in the roads improvement programme of a scheme to upgrade and improve the A95 and calls upon the Executive to consult the local community as to exactly what the scheme will involve, and to lodge full details of their proposals with regard to the A95 in the Scottish Parliament Information Centre. Supported by: Brian Adam, Mr Adam Ingram, Tricia Marwick, Mr Gil Paterson, Mary Scanlon, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Alex Neil, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Duncan Hamilton
S1M-753 A95 (lodged on 7 April 2000) Linda Fabiani*

S1M-753 Fergus Ewing: A95—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by the Scottish Executive of the inclusion in the roads improvement programme of a scheme to upgrade and improve the A95 and calls upon the Executive to consult the local community as to exactly what the scheme will involve, and to lodge full details of their proposals with regard to the A95 in the Scottish Parliament Information Centre. Supported by: Brian Adam, Mr Adam Ingram, Tricia Marwick, Mr Gil Paterson, Mary Scanlon, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Alex Neil, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Linda Fabiani

S1M-753 Fergus Ewing: A95—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by the Scottish Executive of the inclusion in the roads improvement programme of a scheme to upgrade and improve the A95 and calls upon the Executive to consult the local community as to exactly what the scheme will involve, and to lodge full details of their proposals with regard to the A95 in the Scottish Parliament Information Centre. Supported by: Brian Adam, Mr Adam Ingram, Tricia Marwick, Mr Gil Paterson, Mary Scanlon, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Alex Neil, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Linda Fabiani

S1M-753 Fergus Ewing: A95-That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by the Scottish Executive of the inclusion in the roads improvement programme of a scheme to upgrade and improve the A95 and calls upon the Executive to consult the local community as to exactly what the scheme will involve, and to lodge full details of their proposals with regard to the A95 in the Scottish Parliament Information Centre. Supported by: Brian Adam, Mr Adam Ingram, Tricia Marwick, Mr Gil Paterson, Mary Scanlon, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Alex Neil, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Linda Fabiani
